mapper.select:

order by ${orderByClause}

SELECT p.city_code as 'cityCode', c.corp_code as 'corpCode', a.proj_id as 'projId', a.group_name as 'groupName', a.group_leader_name as 'groupLeaderName', a.group_leader_phone as 'groupLeaderPhone', '010' as 'workType', '004' as 'salaryType', a.contract_money as 'contractMoney', p.report_code as 'projNo' FROM up_group_info a LEFT JOIN up_project_info p on p.id = a.proj_id LEFT JOIN up_company_info c on c.id = a.company_id WHERE a.id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
